# <a name="ca2361-ensure-autogenerated-class-containing-datasetreadxml-is-not-used-with-untrusted-data"></a><span data-ttu-id="0ede9-103">CA2361：请确保包含 DataSet.ReadXml() 的自动生成的类没有与不受信任的数据一起使用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ede9-103">CA2361: Ensure autogenerated class containing DataSet.ReadXml() is not used with untrusted data</span></span>

| | <span data-ttu-id="0ede9-104">值</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ede9-104">Value</span></span> |
|-|-|
| <span data-ttu-id="0ede9-105">**规则 ID**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ede9-105">**Rule ID**</span></span> |<span data-ttu-id="0ede9-106">CA2361</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ede9-106">CA2361</span></span>|
| <span data-ttu-id="0ede9-107">**类别**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ede9-107">**Category**</span></span> |[<span data-ttu-id="0ede9-108">Microsoft.Security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ede9-108">Microsoft.Security</span></span>](security-warnings.md)|
| <span data-ttu-id="0ede9-109">**修复是中断或非中断**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ede9-109">**Fix is breaking or non-breaking**</span></span> |<span data-ttu-id="0ede9-110">不间断</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ede9-110">Non-breaking</span></span>|

## <a name="cause"></a><span data-ttu-id="0ede9-111">原因</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ede9-111">Cause</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0ede9-112"><xref:System.Data.DataSet.ReadXml%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>调用了方法或引用了方法，该方法位于自动生成的代码内。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ede9-112">The <xref:System.Data.DataSet.ReadXml%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method was called or referenced, and is within autogenerated code.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0ede9-113">此规则对自动生成的代码 b 进行分类：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ede9-113">This rule classifies autogenerated code b:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0ede9-114">位于名为的方法中 `ReadXmlSerializable` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ede9-114">Being inside a method named `ReadXmlSerializable`.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0ede9-115">`ReadXmlSerializable`方法具有 <xref:System.Diagnostics.DebuggerNonUserCodeAttribute?displayProperty=nameWithType> 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ede9-115">The `ReadXmlSerializable` method has a <xref:System.Diagnostics.DebuggerNonUserCodeAttribute?displayProperty=nameWithType>.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0ede9-116">`ReadXmlSerializable`方法在具有的类型内 <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerCategoryAttribute?displayProperty=nameWithType> 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ede9-116">The `ReadXmlSerializable` method is within a type that has a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerCategoryAttribute?displayProperty=nameWithType>.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0ede9-117">[CA2351](ca2351.md) 是一个类似的规则，在 <xref:System.Data.DataSet.ReadXml%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 未自动生成的代码中出现时。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ede9-117">[CA2351](ca2351.md) is a similar rule, for when <xref:System.Data.DataSet.ReadXml%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> appears within non-autogenerated code.</span></span>

## <a name="rule-description"></a><span data-ttu-id="0ede9-118">规则说明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ede9-118">Rule description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0ede9-119"><xref:System.Data.DataSet>使用不受信任的输入反序列化时，攻击者可以创建恶意输入来执行拒绝服务攻击。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ede9-119">When deserializing a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> with untrusted input, an attacker can craft malicious input to perform a denial of service attack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0ede9-120">可能存在未知的远程代码执行漏洞。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ede9-120">There may be unknown remote code execution vulnerabilities.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0ede9-121">此规则类似于 [CA2351](ca2351.md)，但对于 GUI 应用程序内数据的内存中表示形式，会自动生成代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ede9-121">This rule is like [CA2351](ca2351.md), but for autogenerated code for an in-memory representation of data within a GUI application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0ede9-122">通常，这些自动生成的类不会从不受信任的输入反序列化。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ede9-122">Usually, these autogenerated classes aren't deserialized from untrusted input.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0ede9-123">应用程序的使用情况可能有所不同。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ede9-123">Your application's usage may vary.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0ede9-124">有关详细信息，请参阅 [数据集和 DataTable 安全指南](../../../framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/security-guidance.md)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ede9-124">For more information, see [DataSet and DataTable security guidance](../../../framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/security-guidance.md).</span></span>

## <a name="how-to-fix-violations"></a><span data-ttu-id="0ede9-125">如何解决冲突</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ede9-125">How to fix violations</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0ede9-126">如果可能，请使用 [实体框架](/ef/) 而不是 <xref:System.Data.DataSet> 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ede9-126">If possible, use [Entity Framework](/ef/) rather than the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0ede9-127">使序列化的数据不会被篡改。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ede9-127">Make the serialized data tamper-proof.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0ede9-128">序列化后，对序列化的数据进行加密签名。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ede9-128">After serialization, cryptographically sign the serialized data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0ede9-129">在反序列化之前，验证加密签名。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ede9-129">Before deserialization, validate the cryptographic signature.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0ede9-130">保护加密密钥不被泄露，并为密钥轮换设计。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ede9-130">Protect the cryptographic key from being disclosed and design for key rotations.</span></span>

## <a name="when-to-suppress-warnings"></a><span data-ttu-id="0ede9-131">何时禁止显示警告</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ede9-131">When to suppress warnings</span></span>

[!INCLUDE[insecure-deserializers-common-safe-to-suppress](~/includes/code-analysis/insecure-deserializers-common-safe-to-suppress.md)]

## <a name="pseudo-code-examples"></a><span data-ttu-id="0ede9-132">伪代码示例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ede9-132">Pseudo-code examples</span></span>

### <a name="violation"></a><span data-ttu-id="0ede9-133">冲突</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ede9-133">Violation</span></span>

```csharp
namespace ExampleNamespace
{
    /// <summary>
    ///Represents a strongly typed in-memory cache of data.
    ///</summary>
    [global::System.Serializable()]
    [global::System.ComponentModel.DesignerCategoryAttribute("code")]
    [global::System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItem(true)]
    [global::System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaProviderAttribute("GetTypedDataSetSchema")]
    [global::System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute("Package")]
    [global::System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute("vs.data.DataSet")]
    public partial class Something : global::System.Data.DataSet {

        [global::System.Diagnostics.DebuggerNonUserCodeAttribute()]
        [global::System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratedCodeAttribute("System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGenerator", "4.0.0.0")]
        protected override void ReadXmlSerializable(global::System.Xml.XmlReader reader) {
            if ((this.DetermineSchemaSerializationMode(reader) == global::System.Data.SchemaSerializationMode.IncludeSchema)) {
                this.Reset();
                global::System.Data.DataSet ds = new global::System.Data.DataSet();
                ds.ReadXml(reader);
                if ((ds.Tables["Something"] != null)) {
                    base.Tables.Add(new SomethingTable(ds.Tables["Something"]));
                }
                this.DataSetName = ds.DataSetName;
                this.Prefix = ds.Prefix;
                this.Namespace = ds.Namespace;
                this.Locale = ds.Locale;
                this.CaseSensitive = ds.CaseSensitive;
                this.EnforceConstraints = ds.EnforceConstraints;
                this.Merge(ds, false, global::System.Data.MissingSchemaAction.Add);
                this.InitVars();
            }
            else {
                this.ReadXml(reader);
                this.InitVars();
            }
        }
    }
}
```
